content: what is the state language of republic of kazakhstan?

Based on the provided Constitution of Kazakhstan, the state language of the Republic of Kazakhstan is the Kazakh language. According to Article 7, "The state language of the Republic of Kazakhstan shall be the Kazakh language."

Adopted by referendum on August 30, 1995. 
Entered into force on September 5, 1995. 
Amendments and additions were made on October 7, 1998, May 21, 2007, 
February 2, 2011, March 10, 2017, March 23, 2019, June 8, 2022, September 17, 2022.

ourselves a peace-loving and civil society, dedicated to the ideals of freedom, equality and concord, wishing to take a worthy place

right, accept this CONSTITUTION.

content: Which body is responsible for amending the Constitution of Kazakhstan?

According to Article 98 of the Constitution of Kazakhstan, the bodies of justice and investigation provided for by the Constitution shall be formed in the manner and within the periods stipulated by the relevant laws. Prior to their formation, the existing justice and investigation bodies shall retain their authority. Therefore, it is not clear which body is responsible for amending the Constitution of Kazakhstan, as this responsibility is not explicitly stated in the provided articles.
